properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the FindChangeSatinSetting (a FindChangeTransparencySetting, FindChangeStrokeTransparencySetting, FindChangeFillTransparencySetting or FindChangeContentTransparencySetting).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: If true, applies the satin effect. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: applied

properties.description: The color applied to the satin effect, specified as a swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), a color library color, a hex value, or as an array of color values. The color mode dictates the array values: for RGB, specify three values, each in the range 0 to 255, in the format [R,G,B]; for CMYK, specify four values, each as a percentage and each in the range 0 to 100, in the format [C,M,Y,K]; for LAB, specify three values in the format [L,A,B], with L in the range 0 to 100 and A and B in the range -128 to 127; for HSB, specify three colors in the format [H,S,B], with H in the range 0 to 360 and S and B as percentages in the range 0 to 100. Can return: Swatch or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: effectColor

properties.description: The blending mode for the satin effect. Can return: BlendMode enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: blendMode

properties.description: The opacity of the satin effect (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: opacity

properties.description: The light angle of the satin effect. (Range: -360 to 360). Can return: Real (-180 - 180) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: angle

properties.description: The distance (in pixels) from the FindChangeSatinSetting to the satin effect. Can return: Unit (0 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: distance

properties.description: The width (in pixels) of the satin effect. Can return: Unit (0 - 144 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: size

properties.description: If true, inverts the satin effect. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: invertEffect

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FindChangeSatinSetting.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
